steps.title: Welcome
steps.content: Welcome to the Gender Bias Identification Tool tutorial! This guide will help you understand how to use our tool effectively.

steps.title: Tool Introduction
steps.content: Our tool helps identify and correct gender bias in text. It analyzes language for stereotypes, exclusionary terms, and assumptions based on gender.

steps.title: Inputting Text
steps.content: To begin, enter your text in the input box. You can type directly or paste text from another source.

steps.title: Analyzing Text
steps.content: Click the 'Analyze' button to process your text. The tool will scan for potential gender bias.

steps.title: Interpreting Results
steps.content: Results will show highlighted biased terms, suggested alternatives, and explanations. Pay attention to the type of bias identified.

steps.title: Using AI Suggestions
steps.content: Our AI provides context-aware suggestions for improving your text. Consider these recommendations to make your writing more inclusive.

steps.title: Practice Exercise
steps.content: Let's try an example! We'll provide a sample text for you to analyze and correct using the tool.

steps.title: Completion
steps.content: Congratulations! You've completed the tutorial. You're now ready to use the Gender Bias Identification Tool to create more inclusive content.
